System¶

System related utilities (e.g. filesystem)

system.link_else_copy(filename_from, filename_to)[source]¶

Try to create a hard-link ‘copy’ of a file (almost no space use).

If that doesn’t work then really copy them (files are independent).

Parameters:
  • filename_from – the existing file
  • filename_to – the desired new file
Returns:

True if linking worked, False otherwise
Raise:

OSError if copy fails
system.mkdirp(dir_path)[source]¶

Creates all the directories on dir_path if they do not exist.

Like mkdir -p in shell.

Parameters:dir_path – path whose components will be created as directories
Raise:OSError for unexpected problems and if dir_path is something other than a directory; no error if directory already exists
